mapper.select: SELECT tb.id, sc.name_cn company, tra.money rechargeBalance, DATE_FORMAT(tb.billing_time,'%Y年%m月') date, DATE_FORMAT(tb.repayment_time,'%Y年%m月%d日') repayment, tb.amount amount, (select SUM(freight_paid) from tms_bill_detail tbd where tbd.invoice_no = tb.invoice_no) freightPaid, (select SUM(unpaid_freight) from tms_bill_detail tbd where tbd.invoice_no = tb.invoice_no) unpaidFreight, Round((select SUM(freight_paid) from tms_bill_detail tbd where tbd.invoice_no = tb.invoice_no)/tb.amount, 3) payProgress, Round(tra.money/(select SUM(unpaid_freight) from tms_bill_detail tbd where tbd.invoice_no = tb.invoice_no), 3) canPayPercent FROM tms_bill tb LEFT JOIN tenant_recharge_account tra ON tb.tenant_id = tra.tenant_id LEFT JOIN sys_company sc ON sc.id = tb.tenant_id WHERE tb.type IN ( 1, 2 ) AND tb.STATUS = 0 AND tra.type = '舟山' AND tra.money > 0 HAVING unpaidFreight > 0 and amount > 0 ORDER BY payProgress desc,date asc

SELECT tu.id, sc.name_cn companyName, tu.name_cn nameCn, tu.user_name username, tu.password, tu.status, tu.user_level level FROM tms_user tu LEFT JOIN sys_company sc ON sc.id = tu.tenant_id WHERE tu.removed = 0 AND sc.removed = 0 and sc.name_cn like CONCAT('%', #{companyNameLike,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') limit 20

SELECT ttr.id, sc.name_cn company, CASE ttr.flow_state WHEN 1 THEN '待出账' WHEN 2 THEN '已出账待结清' WHEN 3 THEN '已结清' WHEN 4 THEN '挂账' ELSE '未知' END state, ttr.create_time transactionTime, ttr.fee_type fee, ttr.amount, CASE ttr.transaction_type WHEN 'income' THEN '收入' ELSE '支出' END type, ttr.balance, ttr.transaction_channel channel FROM tms_transaction_record ttr LEFT JOIN outsource_cargo_pool ocp ON ocp.id = ttr.relation_id LEFT JOIN sys_company sc ON sc.id = ocp.tenant_id WHERE ttr.removed = 0 AND ttr.relation_type IN ( 1, 4, 5, 6 ) AND ocp.order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY ttr.create_time ASC
